content:
Based on the execution logs and map state, here is the updated report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron/Copper Smelting Area (Position 0,0 to 4,4)
Consists of three furnaces:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0) - Processing copper ore into plates
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) - Processing copper ore into plates  
- Furnace 3 at (4,4) - Processing iron ore into plates/steel

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (Position 6.5-12.5, 11.5)
Automated assembly line consisting of:
- Input chest at (6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output chest at (12.5, 11.5) storing finished products

### Power Generation System (Position -9.5 to -2.5, 22.5-26.5)
Steam power setup with:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting water flow
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Small electric poles distributing power

### Science Pack Handling (Position 0.5, 28.5-31.5)
Science pack automation with:
- Lab at (0.5, 28.5)
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5)
- Storage chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Management Issues
- Check inventory space before attempting to harvest resources
- Empty full chests to allow continued production

### Furnace Operation Errors
- Cannot insert new material type when furnace contains different material
- Verify furnace contents before attempting to extract items
- Ensure furnace has completed smelting before attempting to extract products

### Research Related Errors
- Cannot set research for already completed technologies
- Check technology prerequisites and completion status before setting research

### Entity Placement Errors
- Verify required items are in inventory before attempting to place entities
- Check placement location is valid and unoccupied

### Resource Extraction Issues
- Ensure target entity contains the item being extracted
- Verify correct quantity is available before attempting extraction
